update bas_operroom set tableNum = #{tableNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, roomType = #{roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operLevel = #{operLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roomCategory = #{roomCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptId = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptName = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maxOperNum = #{maxOperNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, healthNurse = #{healthNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where operRoomId = #{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update bas_operroom set healthNurse = #{healthnurse} where operRoomId = #{operRoomId}
